description:
Laban was a high-ranking noble in Midland`s Court. During the One Hundred Year War, Laban led some of the Midland`s forces and was an early supporter of http://anidb.net/ch660 [Griffith]. He agreed with http://anidb.net/ch2012 [the king] that Griffith should be judged on battlefield merit.
Source: Berserk Wiki, edited.
name: Laban
